name: Double D Pools
tag_list: sports, office, pools, entertainment, online, service, football, basketball
overview:
Pooltrackers takes all of the hard work, as well as the time consuming tasks, of running a successful NFL football and NCAA basketball pools out of your hands. It manages the stats, scores and spreadsheets for you. As a pool manager, all you need to do is to set up the parameters of your favorite sports pool, get your poolies to register on the site, and then have them enter your pool. You will then be able to sit back and enjoy your favorite sports while competing with your friends.

The site manages pools with many different formats to allow you to present a wide variety to your poolies. They currently support NFL football and NCAA March Madness playoff basketball.
